original: @31b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @31b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: au di y'a na m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /
analyzed: au di y'a na m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /
translated: Udyānarājyacikīrṣā

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: audyan gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: audyan gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining Uḍanī’s Mārajitā

original: 'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Noble Mārajītā.

original: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas sdig pa bshags pa'i rjes su stong pa nyid rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas sdig pa bshags pa'i rjes su stong pa nyid rnam par bsgoms la /
translated: After previously confessing misdeeds according to the ritual, meditate on emptiness.

original: sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la mam gi sa bon dmar po yongs su gyur pa las au dyan gyi 'od zer can mdog dmar ba /
analyzed: sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la mam gi sa bon dmar po yongs su gyur pa las au dyan gyi 'od zer can mdog dmar ba /
translated: From the seed syllable maṃ, which is red, on a multicolored lotus and sun, arises Uḍanī’s Mārajītā, red,

original: zhal drug pa phyag bcu gnyis pa zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum mo //🔽dmar po dang / @32a * //
analyzed: zhal drug pa phyag bcu gnyis pa zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum mo // dmar po dang / @32a * //
translated: with six faces, twelve arms, and three eyes in each face.🔽The five faces to the right are red,

original: nag po dang / dkar po dang / ljang gu dang / ser po ni g-yas skor du zhal lnga'o //
analyzed: nag po dang / dkar po dang / ljang gu dang / ser po ni g-yas skor du zhal lnga'o //
translated: black, white, green, and yellow.

original: steng du ni phag zhal nag po'o //
analyzed: steng du ni phag zhal nag po'o //
translated: The face above is a black pig face.

original: dang po g-yas kyi phyag drug tu go rims bzhin du ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gtun shing dang / mda' dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o //
analyzed: dang po g-yas kyi phyag drug tu go rims bzhin du ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gtun shing dang / mda' dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o //
translated: In the first six right hands, in order, he holds a sword, a discus, a pestle, an arrow, an axe, and a single-pronged vajra.

original: g-yon gyi phyag rnams su sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / kha tv'am ga dang / thod pa dang / mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang / tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / gzhu dang rtse gsum mo //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag rnams su sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / kha tv'am ga dang / thod pa dang / mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang / tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / gzhu dang rtse gsum mo //
translated: In the left hands he holds a lasso with a threatening forefinger, a khaṭvāṅga, a skull cup, an aśoka branch, a head of Brahmā, a bow, and a trident.

original: mchod rten gyi nang na gnas pa /
analyzed: mchod rten gyi nang na gnas pa /
translated: He is inside a stūpa.

original: klu'i dbang po brgyad kyis sku brgyan pa /
analyzed: klu'i dbang po brgyad kyis sku brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with the eight nāga kings.

original: skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng ba /
analyzed: skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng ba /
translated: His tawny hair bristles upward.

original: zhal mche ba gtsigs pa /
analyzed: zhal mche ba gtsigs pa /
translated: His face bares its fangs.

original: mgo bo skam po brgyad kyis dbu brgyan pa /
analyzed: mgo bo skam po brgyad kyis dbu brgyan pa /
translated: He is crowned with eight dried skulls.

original: mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba ske ba nas 'chang ba /
analyzed: mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba ske ba nas 'chang ba /
translated: He wears a garland of fresh heads around his neck.

original: rin po che mang pos spras pa'i shing rta sna tshogs pa phag pa bdun la chibs pa /
analyzed: rin po che mang pos spras pa'i shing rta sna tshogs pa phag pa bdun la chibs pa /
translated: He rides a variegated chariot drawn by seven boars, which is adorned with many jewels.

original: phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba /
analyzed: phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba /
translated: Outside, he is surrounded by the eight charnel grounds.

original: shing rta'i dbus su gnas pa ni skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: shing rta'i dbus su gnas pa ni skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: In the center of the chariot, she stands in the vajra posture.

original: rdo rje dang khab dang / mya ngan med dang / sdigs mdzub bsnams pa /
analyzed: rdo rje dang khab dang / mya ngan med dang / sdigs mdzub bsnams pa /
translated: She holds a vajra, a needle, an aśoka branch, and a threatening mudrā.

original: mdog bzang po'i 'od zer can sha 'gag ser po /
analyzed: mdog bzang po'i 'od zer can sha 'gag ser po /
translated: She is beautiful, with radiant light rays, and has yellow breasts.

original: sna tshogs kyi rin po ches brgyan pa /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi rin po ches brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with various jewels.

original: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs kyis kyang brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs kyis kyang brgyan pa'o //
translated: She is also adorned with a tiger-skin skirt.🔽From the red light, the five tathāgatas emanate and are instantly visualized.

original: 'od dmar po las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga spro ba dang / skad cig gis bsams la snying gar nyi ma la mam gi sa bon las rnam par byung ba'i 'od zer brgyad /
analyzed: 'od dmar po las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga spro ba dang / skad cig gis bsams la snying gar nyi ma la mam gi sa bon las rnam par byung ba'i 'od zer brgyad /
translated: At the heart, on a sun, from the seed syllable maṃ, eight light rays emanate.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bkug ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bkug ste /
translated: The buddhas and bodhisattvas are summoned.

original: dbang bskur ba blangs nas rnam par snang mdzad bdag nyid kyi dbu rgyan du rnam par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba blangs nas rnam par snang mdzad bdag nyid kyi dbu rgyan du rnam par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Having received the empowerment, they should be imagined as the crown ornament of Vairocana.

original: de nas rnal 'byor pas 'khor lo 'khor ba'i rim pa 'dis sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor pas 'khor lo 'khor ba'i rim pa 'dis sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: Then, the yogī should perform the mantra recitation with this wheel-turning process.

original: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ māri cye māṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: bzlas pa byas nas phyis kyi dus su ting nge 'dzin nye bar bsdus la de nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bzlas pa byas nas phyis kyi dus su ting nge 'dzin nye bar bsdus la de nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
translated: Having performed the recitation, later at the time of the evening, one should gather the meditative stabilization and remain as one likes with the yoga of that very [goddess].

original: au dyan gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: au dyan gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs /
translated: The Sadhana of Uḍyāna Marici

original: slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
translated: The composition of Ācārya Sahaja-rāja is complete.

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated by the paṇḍita Amoghavajra and the Kham pa lotsāwa Gelong Bar.
